mapper.select: /* retrieveReplyList */ SELECT REPLY.PRODUCT_CODE , REPLY.USER_CODE , (SELECT ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = REPLY.USER_CODE) AS USER_ID , REPLY.USER_REPLY_NO , REPLY.USER_REPLY , REPLY.REPLY_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPLY WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}) AS REPLY_COUNT , (SELECT USER_IMAGE FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = REPLY.USER_CODE) AS USER_IMAGE , (SELECT MARK_RATING FROM TB_MARK WHERE 1=1 AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} AND USER_CODE = REPLY.USER_CODE) AS MARK_RATING FROM TB_REPLY REPLY WHERE 1=1 AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} ORDER BY REPLY.REPLY_DATE DESC

/* retrieveReply */ SELECT REPLY.PRODUCT_CODE , REPLY.USER_CODE , (SELECT ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = REPLY.USER_CODE) AS USER_ID , REPLY.USER_REPLY_NO , REPLY.USER_REPLY , REPLY.REPLY_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPLY WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}) AS REPLY_COUNT , (SELECT USER_IMAGE FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = REPLY.USER_CODE) AS USER_IMAGE FROM TB_REPLY REPLY WHERE 1=1 AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode}
